title: Error Missing value for property 'account.address' when i recover account on 2 devices (android)
body:
### Description *Type*: Bug *Summary*: `Missing value for property 'account.address'` with the details `05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: NAME: "Error" 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: Missing value for property 'account.address' 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: create@[native code] 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$4@index.android.bundle:12:5325878 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:6620833 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: write@[native code] 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: write@index.android.bundle:12:5324892 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: save@index.android.bundle:12:6621025 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:6624173 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:5298802 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: s@index.android.bundle:12:5298061 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: run_state_machine@index.android.bundle:12:5041645 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: run_state_machine_wrapped@index.android.bundle:12:5041797 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:5042245 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:5028568 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: process_messages@index.android.bundle:12:5022168 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:32:1787 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: x@index.android.bundle:32:643 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: k@index.android.bundle:32:1007 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: callImmediates@index.android.bundle:32:3188 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:3183 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:27:1516 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:3009 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:1486 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code] 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:1094 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code] 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: 05:02 I/ReactNativeJS: *** 05:02 I/HwPointEventFilter: do not support AFT because of no config` and `Error: No item 1 in vector of length 1` with details `05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: This error is located at: 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in home 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in reagent21 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in reagent20 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in with-activity-indicator 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in reagent18 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in main-tabs 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in reagent17 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in main 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in root 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in reagent1 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in RCTView 05:02 E/ReactNativeJS: in t` are shown when i recover account on Android and the same account is already recoeverd on another device #### Expected behavior no errors #### Actual behavior ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/39695467-532f829e-51f3-11e8-97e4-3bf4bb680647.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/39695475-58e5428c-51f3-11e8-8c63-e5c4dee24208.png) ### Reproduction - Open Status on iOS and recover known account there - Open Status on Android and create new account - Logout on Android - Recover same account on Android as you recovered on iOS - While signing in multitap `Sign in` several times (6 in my case) ### Additional Information * Status version: nightly 367 * Operating System: Android, iOS #### Logs https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/8233339/sessions/42/?accessToken=YKF9tviFJhydE1/wuGk0QAJuaDM
